channel.title: Server update timer
channel.description: I need a server update timer[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 09:49:33 PM[/size][hr]like in the corner is says server update:2:01 then like counts down[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 12:59:43 PM[/size][hr]some 1 plz i cant wait forever

item.title: Server update timer
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Goodoo dolls:

ok thx and i knew that duh im not 6

Wasn’t directed at you…

item.title: Server update timer
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

[quote=“Xbox Modder, post:3, topic:92655”]This should do it…

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }[/quote]

Abd might want to chnage player rights to 3. Because your admins could use that command.

Read full topic

item.title: Server update timer
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ok, if you put ::update SECONDS, then ::update 200 would be 3 minutes 20 seconds, seeing as there is 60 seconds in a minute and not 100…

Read full topic

item.title: Server update timer
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

[quote=“Xbox Modder, post:3, topic:92655”]This should do it…

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }[/quote]

Dont you have to add plaerrights on it ?
and isnt this included in all Server sources?

~Joery~

Read full topic

item.title: Server update timer
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

This should do it…

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
